Package team

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • team.Hero
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Selectable

    public class Hero
extends java.lang.Object
implements Selectable
    Defines Hero objects that are used as the protagonists of the game
    Author:
    fer25 par116

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero​(int temp_health,
            int temp_illusion,
            int temp_healing,
            int temp_haggling)
        Creates a Hero object
        Parameters:
        temp_health - The maximum health of the Hero. THe hero's health is also set to this value on creation
        temp_illusion - The Hero's illusion stat
        temp_healing - The Hero's healing stat
        temp_haggling - The Hero's haggling stat

    • Method Detail

      • adjustHealth

        public void adjustHealth​(int i)
        Adds i to the health of the Hero. Will not allow health to go below zero or above TOTAL_HEALTH. Negative values of i supported Will not add health to a dead Hero
        Parameters:
        i - The amount of health to be added to the Hero
